Features.EasySmithing.VoxelsPerClick.Des: Change the number of voxels that are moved, per click. Min: 1, Max: 8, Default: 1.
Features.EasySmithing.CostPerClick.Descr: Change the durability cost, per use. Min: 1, Max: 10, Default: 5.
Features.EasySmithing.InstantComplete.De: Change whether or not the work item should be instantly completed, on use. True, or False, Default: False.
Features.EasySmithing.ModMenu.lblDescrip: Provides an easier way for players to smith items on an anvil within the game.
Features.EasySmithing.ModMenu.lblVoxelsP: Determines the number of voxels that are handled at one time
Features.EasySmithing.ModMenu.lblCostPer: Determines the amount of durability that is lost at one time
Features.EasySmithing.ModMenu.lblInstant: Determines whether to instantly complete the current recipe
